title: Round-the-clock gas supply assured in Karachi during Eid holidays - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
KARACHI: Residents in the metropolis may breathe a sigh of relief during the three days of Eidul Azha, as the Sui Southern Gas Company (SSGC) has assured round-the-clock gas supply till the third day of the religious festival till midnight.

An SSGC spokesperson stated that the gas utility was taking all necessary measures to ensure a continuous supply of gas during the joyous occasion.

He added that, following the Eidul Azha, gas would be supplied to the city from 6am to 10pm.

Published in Dawn, June 7th, 2025
